topic.title: Internal error: TypeError: 'NoneType' object does not support item assignment
topic.body:
Internal error: TypeError: 'NoneType' object does not support item assignment
UiWebsocket.py line 98 > UiWebsocket.py line 178 > UiWebsocket.py line 438


what ?

topic.title: is there anyway to avoid duplicate files?
topic.body: for example every zeroblog have the same loading file does zeronet download the file everytime or it look on local blog for the same file ?

1_1NgEo4Jc4cvC6ab7J834Ex6DoX9aqmXUi9.body:

sometimes when create new topic is clicked

> [nofish](#comment_472_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): Looks like a signature problem, is it happening here?

so is a problem with the proxy .............
